description: Power home's consumed vs Photovoltaic Production

targets.query: SELECT mean("power")  * 0.166667 FROM "emeter" WHERE ("poller" = 'pyshelly' AND "hostname" = 'shellyem') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("ac_out_grid_power")  * 0.166667 FROM "device_status" WHERE ("poller" = 'pypeimar' AND "hostname" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

panels.title: Average energy balance for every 10 minutes

panels.description: When energy surplus is greater than zero then "Energy Self-consumption = Home's Energy Consumed"

targets.query: SELECT mean("power")  * 0.166667 FROM "emeter" WHERE ("poller" = 'pyshelly' AND "hostname" = 'shellyem') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("ac_out_grid_power")  * 0.166667 FROM "device_status" WHERE ("poller" = 'pypeimar' AND "hostname" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

panels.title: Average energy surplus for every 10 minutes

panels.description: When energy missing is lower than zero then "Energy Self-consumption = Solar Energy Produced"

targets.query: SELECT mean("power")  * 0.166667 FROM "emeter" WHERE ("poller" = 'pyshelly' AND "hostname" = 'shellyem') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("ac_out_grid_power")  * 0.166667 FROM "device_status" WHERE ("poller" = 'pypeimar' AND "hostname" = 'inverter') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

panels.title: Average energy missing for every 10 minutes
